title: samayamidE (javaLi)
sahitya:
samayamidE rArA nA sAmi tAmasicakura


anupallavi

  kamala vairicanudencinA kAmkSaliDEradura


caraNam 1    magaDu yUralEdu nA mAmAgAri jOli lEdani vagadega selisinadigA vaTTi pantamElara
    caraNam 2    mannanacE nIvu vacci nannu gUDi yuNDinaTlu ninnarEyi kalakaNTini NIrajAkSa venkaTEsha
